DataElement.preferredName: Quality of Life Patient Address Postal Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the postal code of the patient completing quality of life questionaire.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Quality of Life Patient Address Postal Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the patient quality of life address postal code.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.:A person who requires medical care.:The location at which an organization or person can be reached. (from American Heritage Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
The location at which an organization or person can be reached. (from American Heritage Dictionary)

ObjectClass.changeDescription: 2023-01-17 Updated Short Name to match associated concepts by replacing the old Temporary NCIt UMLS CL Concept Code with UMLS Code - DW

Property.preferredDefinition: Any system designed to expedite the sorting and delivery of mail by assigning a series of alphanumeric codes to each delivery area.  Also used to refer to any individual delivery area code.

Concepts.definition: Any system designed to expedite the sorting and delivery of mail by assigning a series of alphanumeric codes to each delivery area. Also used to refer to any individual delivery area code.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: all components of an address, including building number, street name and type, city, state, postal code, and country.
all components of an address, including building number, street name and type, city, state, postal code, and country.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
